info.name: VisitandMedcare Dental
info.address: TERRACE FULYA CENTER, Teşvikiye Mah. Hakkı Yeten Cad, Fulya Sk. No: 11, 34365 Şişli/İstanbul
info.description: Leading dental care clinic in Istanbul and Antalya, specializing in zirconium crowns, Hollywood smiles, and advanced dental treatments.
info.longDescription: VisitandMedcare Dental is a premier dental clinic located in Istanbul and Antalya, dedicated to providing high-quality and advanced dental treatments. Our expert team specializes in zirconium crowns, Hollywood smiles, dental implants, and other cosmetic and restorative procedures. We prioritize patient satisfaction and use the latest technology to achieve stunning, natural-looking results. Your smile is our passion!
